curated_text: Symbol: WMT. Year: 2024. Period: Q1. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: Competition Commission of India, Flipkart, CCI, Company, Walmart International, Sam's Club, Walmart, Walmart Connect, CODM, Walmart International's, Sam's Club's, Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition, Walmart Inc.'s, Consolidated Financial Statements, Return on Investment, The Big Billion Days, BBD, Liquidity and Capital Resources, ROA, Allocation of Capital Expenditures, Total Capital Expenditures, Capital Resources, Consolidated, Contents Walmart U.S., Contents Sam's, Capital Resources Liquidity, Working Capital Deficit Cash, Vizio Holding Corp., Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows, Total Balances, Record Date Payable Date March, the Company's Board of Directors, Standard & Poor's A-1+ AA Moody's Investors Service P-1, the Prescription Opiate Litigation, the Asda Equal Value, United States Federal Trade Commission, Office for the Middle District, the Comisión Federal de Competencia Económica, the Directorate of Enforcement to Flipkart, Foreign Direct Investment. Context excerpt: Competition Commission of India ("CCI") ordered its Director General ("DG") to investigate certain matters alleging competition law violations by certain subsidiaries of Flipkart in India and other parties. On September 13, 2024, those subsidiaries received a non-confidential version of the DG's Investigation Report ("Report"), alleging certain competition law violations. CCI is not bound by the Report, and will conduct its independent analysis of the allegations, including hearing objections from the subsidiaries and other parties before issuing its final order in the matter, which could include monetary and non-monetary relief. CCI's final order would also be subject to appropriate appellate proceedings. The Company can provide no assurance as to the scope and outcome of this matter, cannot reasonably estimate any loss or range of loss that may arise, and can provide no assurance that its business, financial position, results of operations or cash flows will not be materially adverse
